messages.unquotedReservedProperty: Unquoted reserved word '{{property}}' used as key.
messages.unquotedNumericProperty: Unquoted number literal '{{property}}' used as key.
messages.redundantQuoting: Properties shouldn't be quoted as all quotes are redundant.

docs.description: enforce the consistent use of either backticks, double, or single quotes
enforce the consistent use of the radix argument when using `parseInt()`

messages.invalidRadix: Invalid radix parameter, must be an integer between 2 and 36.

docs.description: disallow assignments that can lead to race conditions due to usage of `await` or `yield`

require JSDoc comments
enforce the use of `u` flag on RegExp

require or disallow semicolons instead of ASI

docs.description: enforce sorted import declarations within modules

messages.sortMembersAlphabetically: Member '{{memberName}}' of the import declaration should be sorted alphabetically.

docs.description: require object keys to be sorted

messages.sortKeys: Expected object keys to be in {{natural}}{{insensitive}}{{order}}ending order. '{{thisName}}' should be before '{{prevName}}'.

docs.description: require variables within the same declaration block to be sorted

messages.sortVars: Variables within the same declaration block should be sorted alphabetically.

docs.description: enforce consistent spacing before blocks
enforce consistent spacing before `function` definition opening parenthesis
enforce consistent spacing inside parentheses

messages.missingOpeningSpace: There must be a space after this paren.
messages.missingClosingSpace: There must be a space before this paren.
messages.rejectedOpeningSpace: There should be no space after this paren.
messages.rejectedClosingSpace: There should be no space before this paren.

docs.description: require spacing around infix operators
enforce consistent spacing before or after unary operators

messages.wordOperator: Unary word operator '{{word}}' must be followed by whitespace.
messages.operator: Unary operator '{{operator}}' must be followed by whitespace.
messages.beforeUnaryExpressions: Space is required before unary expressions '{{token}}'.

docs.description: enforce consistent spacing after the `//` or `/*` in a comment

messages.unexpectedSpaceAfterMarker: Unexpected space or tab after marker ({{refChar}}) in comment.
messages.expectedExceptionAfter: Expected exception block, space or tab after '{{refChar}}' in comment.
messages.unexpectedSpaceBefore: Unexpected space or tab before '*/' in comment.
messages.unexpectedSpaceAfter: Unexpected space or tab after '{{refChar}}' in comment.
messages.expectedSpaceBefore: Expected space or tab before '*/' in comment.
messages.expectedSpaceAfter: Expected space or tab after '{{refChar}}' in comment.

docs.description: require or disallow strict mode directives

messages.function: Use the function form of 'use strict'.
messages.global: Use the global form of 'use strict'.
messages.module: 'use strict' is unnecessary inside of modules.
messages.implied: 'use strict' is unnecessary when implied strict mode is enabled.
messages.unnecessaryInClasses: 'use strict' is unnecessary inside of classes.
messages.nonSimpleParameterList: 'use strict' directive inside a function with non-simple parameter list throws a syntax error since ES2016.
messages.wrap: Wrap {{name}} in a function with 'use strict' directive.

allowComputed.description: If `false`, will report computed (and thus, un-lintable) references to namespace members.

docs.description: Forbid a module from importing itself

allowArray.description: If `false`, will report default export of an array

allowArrowFunction.description: If `false`, will report default export of an arrow function

allowCallExpression.description: If `false`, will report default export of a function call

allowAnonymousClass.description: If `false`, will report default export of an anonymous class

allowAnonymousFunction.description: If `false`, will report default export of an anonymous function

allowLiteral.description: If `false`, will report default export of a literal

allowObject.description: If `false`, will report default export of an object expression

src.description: files/paths to be analyzed (only for unused exports)

ignoreExports.description: files/paths for which unused exports will not be reported (e.g module entry points)

docs.description: require `return` statements after callbacks

messages.missingReturn: Expected return with your callback function.
